Articles.Content:
Help! I can no longer activate stages after modding my game. Are there any mods known to produce such a bug? Or is this a problem with the base game?

Thanks in advance
Not as far as I know. Please read the [thread=92229]How to Get Support[/thread] sticky Ã¢â‚¬â€œ your Player.log and mod list (with versions) might help track down the issue.

Recently, outdated Firespitter plugins have been known to break staging (as well as not loading the IVA) when you go to launch.. course, it'd help a lot if you mentioned what mods you put it in the first place.
Problem fixed: I found that FMRS was improperly installed and caused this issue
